events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
The case has been assigned to customer support agent Lisa M. for handling the refund request.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your order and I’m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received to help us process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 123456 and I have attached a photo showing that the wrong item was sent to me.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Thanks for the prompt response. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund process has been completed and your funds should appear within the next few business days.
Just checking in to confirm that the refund was received and everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
We are closing this case now. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance in the future.
We would appreciate your feedback on your recent support experience. Please take a moment to complete our survey.
